talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Because of the size of the vibration, there's a wide range of areas to look at. While we're checking the nightmare, why don't you examine the Silver Dragon's Forcefield?

$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Of course, our Dragon must be keeping an eye on the place, but we need to determine the cause. If there's something as strange as before, we might need your power.

$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Thank you. Take care!
<html>$Unexpected Encounter$</html>

$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Thank you. Take care!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Trouble? That's not it! Anyway, what the heck is going on here?!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
(Velskud looks incredibly angry.)
Tell me! What trouble did you make this time?!

※This quest cannot be carried out in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>How could I not see it? A massive new road sprang up out of nowhere!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
You came here without even knowing what happened?
(He seems to clench his teeth as if biting his tongue.)
It was a huge vibration that shook the whole barrier, and you didn't feel it? At least you recognize that the place has changed.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Rearranged… Is that what happened in <FONT color=#086171>Saint Haven</FONT>?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Yeah, exactly. Space has been totally rearranged.

$Velskud$
Of course there have been changes there too. Isn't that why you came to see me?

${user_nick}$
(You tell Velskud what Priestess of Darkness Shea said and about the changes in Saint Haven.)
His Majesty and I are the only ones who recognize the situation.

$Velskud$
I'm not surprised. That's how humans are. The things that surround them have changed completely, yet they don't even see it. They carry on as calmly as fish in a fishbowl.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But why has this happened in Saint Haven specifically?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Think of the underlying principles of this world, fool. Lagendia can change at any time according to the Goddess's dreams. This time the change was so enormous that the entirety of space is shaking in the aftereffects. It's because the whole dream has moved.

$Velskud$
… You still don't know what's inSaint Haven?

$Velskud$
(Glares at you coldly)

$Velskud$
Yes. TheGarden of Time and Space is a place for collecting and monitoring the Goddess's nightmares. Of course, the place is greatly influenced by dreams.

$Velskud$
I'm sure you remember what the collapse was about.

${user_nick}$
Because Labynia haphazardly fashioned and separated the fabric of space... The Goddess's nightmares are being created randomly?

$Velskud$
You've finally found a use for that tiny head of yours.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>No way, that's why this place has changed, too?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
The Garden of Time and Space, the Labyrinth, the Storm of Time and Space… Think about it. You consider this place to be safe, but Saint Haven is on the front line of the nightmare.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>There's nothing wrong with the barrier though, right?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Yeah. It's the same problem. Even if the barrier blocks the nightmare's energy from flowing into the open Monolith, the change in dreams is bound to appear most intensely here.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh, not at all! But with that amount of vibration... The Goddess is not going to wake up, right?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
… How dare you doubt my ability? You've become quite brave.

$Velskud$
Why, are you worried?

${user_nick}$
It's obvious! Don't we need the Cup of Healing to wake up the Goddess? Hold on… But if the Goddess wakes up, does what Feder said before come true? Our entire world will disappear! What the heck do we do?

$Velskud$
Stop making a fuss. I'm having enough trouble thinking about Labynia... Wait, what is that?

${user_nick}$
(All of a sudden, a whirlwind envelops {user_nick}'s body.)
... Huh? What? What is this?

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Labynia$
… You.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What the heck are you doing here? Are you splitting the fabric of space again??</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Labynia$
(Labynia appears shocked.)

$Labynia${action:Talk}
Have… Have you come to kill me?

${user_nick}$
(Uh, no way? Why did I say that? I don't know what'll happen in the days to come.
… But… She looks scared…)
Well, who are you? What the heck are you doing? Why are you tearing apart the fabric of space? What are you doing to this world?

$Labynia$
… You are wrong.

$Labynia$
I am different from her. I will never approach you.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What do you mean? Please speak more clearly!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Labynia$
I'm frightened... That which must not move... has starting moving. Still, I have a mission. I cannot just remain here in this... dream within a dream.

$Labynia$
It has begun to flow again.

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Vandar${action:Talk}{sound:npc_van_q3871_06.ogg}
That's strange. Are you really a Lagendian? Aren't you from Mistland like me? You look like you're from Red Lotus Palace.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Sure, but why would a Mistlander be here?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Vandar${sound:npc_van_q3871_07.ogg}
Relax. I'm not the enemy. I'm also a victim like you. You shouldn't judge people by where they're from.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>The Silver Dragon's Forcefield? Did you see… Velskud?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Vandar$
Yes. That Priestess of Darkness or whatever told me to go to the Silver Dragon's Forcefield, and then a really…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>… Feder! You saw Feder, the Red Dragon? But he... died.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Vandar$
If you're talking about a tough guy in fancy armor, yeah, I did, you're right. And plus, there was another guy wearing flashy red armor and yelling that he's going to be a god.

$Vandar${sound:npc_van_q3871_08.ogg}
Two Red Dragons? I've never heard of that before. Keep talking.

${user_nick}$
(Wait, can I say that in front of a Mistlander? I wonder if it's okay since Velskud kept him alive.)
How... How did you know there were... two Red Dragons?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'll tell you about it in exchange for your story.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Vandar$
You want me to just tell you that for free?

$Vandar$
Oh, that's an unexpected offer. Hmm... Alright. When I almost died, a red-haired man came and invested a power within me.
I'm not certain, but I think... he was the Red Dragon.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#a82424>Rubinart</FONT> and <FONT color=#a82424>Feder</FONT> were friends. Rubinart gave his jewel to Feder.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Vandar$
The story after that is irrelevant, but you told me he was a Red Dragon, so I just got to thinking "There are two Red Dragons?" is all. Now tell me your story.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>No, it's a long story, but... Anyway it's in the past.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Vandar$
Is that all it takes to be a Dragon? So there's a Dragon here somewhere?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>This is the Old Saint Haven. I don't know how you got here.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Vandar$
Oh-ho, it all happened in the past and I was able to see it with my own eyes...? What is going on here?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Agreed. <FONT color=#7e12d2>(I should see what the others have to say for now.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Vandar${sound:npc_van_q3871_09.ogg}
I see... Anyway, let's do our best to get along. If we're gonna get out of here, we have to tell the truth and cooperate with each other, regardless of whether we're Lagendians or Mistlanders.

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Vandar$
What a strange place… A world of dreams?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(I've never met this person before. Yet... somehow they seems familiar.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kali${sound:npc_kal_q3859_04.ogg}
It's a surprise to be in Old Saint Haven, but... We're here in accordance with the will of the Goddess, so we might leave in accordance with the will of the Goddess...

$Kali${action:Talk}
…! You… were with, Lunaria in the Monolith…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Is this the adventurer she spoke of?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kali$
Ah, I was right. Yes, I told them about you. I asked them to take you in as a companion.

${user_nick}$
I'm… I'm {user_nick}. You're a real person aren't you? Not a dream, or an apparition?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>A dream within a dream?<FONT color=#7e12d2> (That's what Labynia said earlier.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kali$
I'm Kali. Of course I'm a real person with flesh and blood! This place is just a dream within a dream, but we're all human beings. That is, assuming you're a living person, {user_nick}.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>A fragment… No way… Is it our destiny to be here?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kali$
Yes. A dream within a dream… It is a fragment that fell out of our reality into the deepest part of the dream.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Labynia was afraid, too. She said something that shouldn't be moved was moving</FONT><FONT color=#2b2723>…</FONT><FONT color=#7e12d2>)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kali${sound:npc_kal_q3859_01.ogg}
Well, there's no such thing as a set fate, but maybe it's because of the termor in the dream. A dream can be a scary thing.

$Kali${sound:npc_kal_q3859_02.ogg}
If the Goddess has so much power, why can't she control time?
I don't know why there aren't any happy dreams among these scary ones...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It's because we feel the same way. Feder made the wrong choice, but I think I know why.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kali$
You look very sad.

$Kali${sound:npc_kal_q3859_03.ogg}
Changes in the dream, a dream within a dream, the vortex… Is this the catastrophe that Feder was talking about? If the Goddess wakes up, we'll...

$Kali$
{user_nick}?

${user_nick}$
There must be a way out. We can stop it. There's a reason why we're here, there has to be.

$Kali$
I hope so...

${user_nick}$
(Come to think of it, that might be correct. Somehow, I feel safer here, and I think there must be a reason why I came here.)

${user_nick}$
(This time it's different from Mobius. I feel like I'm where I should be, where I should have come. And I even feel warm and cozy.)

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Kali$
How can we get out of here?

$Velskud$
You troublemaker! What are you doing here!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Look, we didn't come here because we wanted to!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Quiet! You're lucky your very existence hasn't been eradicated, coming all the way here. You fools, go back to where you came from!

$Velskud$
(Velskud glares in your direction with terrifying eyes. It would be beneficial for your health not to say anything right now.)
Do you know where you are right now? You're in a dream within a dream. I couldn't hold onto you before, so you were swept all the way here!

$Velskud$
I thought you were an okay kid, but I guess I was mistaken. It must have been hard for that woman to clean up your messes all the time...
(His mouth snaps shut and he seems to be holding back his anger.)
Quickly, grab my hand.

$Velskud$
Unless you want to spend a thousand years here, grab my hand. You'll have to keep your wits about you to avoid being swept away.

$Velskud$
You must want to stay here for a thousand years. I won't stop you.

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Velskud$
Grab my hand, you fool! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
Idiot! How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(So this place… is the Silver Dragon's... Forcefield)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
...
<html>$Quest Complete$</html>

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅰ
journal.contents:
Go to the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.
It's true that a huge transformation has occurred, but you don't know why, or how it has affected the rest of the world. Go to the Silver Dragon's Forcefield and find out what's going on.

Silver Dragon's Forcefield-Velskud
journal.todo_msg: Go to the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅱ
journal.contents:
Speak with Labynia.
After falling into the cracks created by the distortions in Time and Space, you see her right in front of you. Talk to Labynia.

Sunset Watchtower-Labynia

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅲ
journal.contents:
Speak with Vandar.
You were swept up by another whirlwind before you could have a proper conversation with Labynia. This time you were suddenly dropped into a new location. Will the whirlwind appear here too? Speak with the people here for now.

Old Saint Haven-Vandar

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅳ
journal.contents:
Speak with Kali.
You were swept up by another whirlwind before you could have a proper conversation with Labynia. This time you were suddenly dropped into a new location. Will the whirlwind appear here too? Speak with the people here for now.

Old Saint Haven-Kali

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅵ
journal.contents:
Speak with Velskud.
As you were speaking with the others and beginning to fall into the abyss of despair, Velskud appeared before you. Is he, like Labynia, part of the Goddess's dream within a dream that appeared for but an instance? Speak with him and find out.

Old Saint Haven-Velskud

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅵ
journal.contents:
Speak with Velskud.
You escaped the Old Saint Haven, the dream within a dream. Velskud is looking your way silently. Talk to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

Silver Dragon's Forcefield-Velskud
